articles.description: Telecoms giant is spinning off media business in combination with Discovery, investors will receive one share in new WarnerBros. Discovery joint venture for roughly every four AT&T shares they own
articles.content: AT&T Inc. detailed its plans for the spinoff of WarnerMedia on Friday, with investors eventually expected to receive a share of the new streaming-media entity for every four AT&T shares they … [+2671 chars]
